body_html: @bhack tf.py_func() has to acquire the GIL in order to run read_fn, so unless there is a substantial amount of work in that function that happens while the GIL is released, it is unlikely that you will see much of a parallel speedup for that code.
body_text: @bhack tf.py_func() has to acquire the GIL in order to run read_fn, so unless there is a substantial amount of work in that function that happens while the GIL is released, it is unlikely that you will see much of a parallel speedup for that code.
body: @bhack `tf.py_func()` has to acquire the GIL in order to run `read_fn`, so unless there is a substantial amount of work in that function that happens while the GIL is released, it is unlikely that you will see much of a parallel speedup for that code.
